kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the cluster.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the cluster.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this cluster resides.

capacityGB.description: Gets or sets Maximum capacity of this datastore, in GBs.

freeSpaceGB.description: Gets or sets Available space of this datastore, in GBs.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the datastore.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the datastore.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this datastore resides.

credentials.description: Username / Password Credentials to provision guest agent.

httpProxyConfig.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

privateLinkScopeResourceId.description: The resource id of the private link scope this machine is assigned to, if any.

provisioningAction.description: Gets or sets the guest agent provisioning action.

password.description: Gets or sets the password to connect with the guest.

privateKey.description: Private key used to authenticate to a virtual machine through ssh.

username.description: Gets or sets username to connect with the guest.

memorySizeMB.description: Gets or sets memory size in MBs for the vm.

numCoresPerSocket.description: Gets or sets the number of cores per socket for the vm. Defaults to 1 if unspecified.

numCPUs.description: Gets or sets the number of vCPUs for the vm.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the host.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the host.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this host resides.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the virtual machine.

smbiosUuid.description: Gets or sets the SMBIOS UUID of the vm.

templateId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the template resource to deploy the virtual machine.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource.

moName.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the resource.

managedResourceId.description: Gets or sets the tracked resource id corresponding to the inventory resource.

moName.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the inventory item.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the inventory item.

deviceKey.description: Gets or sets the device key value.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the network interface.

networkId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the network resource to connect the virtual machine.

powerOnBoot.description: Gets or sets the power on boot.

networkInterfaces.description: Gets or sets the list of network interfaces associated with the virtual machine.
Gets or sets the list of network interfaces associated with the virtual machine.

allocationMethod.description: Gets or sets the nic allocation method.

dnsServers.description: Gets or sets the dns servers.

ipAddress.description: Gets or sets the ip address for the nic.

osType.description: Gets or sets the type of the os.

clusterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the cluster resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

datastoreId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the datastore resource on which the data for the virtual machine will be kept.

hostId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the host resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

resourcePoolId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the resourcePool resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource pool.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the resource pool.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.

uefiSettings.description: Specifies the security settings like secure boot used while creating the virtual machine.

disks.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual disks associated with the virtual machine.
Gets or sets the list of virtual disks associated with the virtual machine.

secureBootEnabled.description: Specifies whether secure boot should be enabled on the virtual machine.

credentials.description: Username / Password Credentials to connect to vcenter.

fqdn.description: Gets or sets the FQDN/IPAddress of the vCenter.

port.description: Gets or sets the port of the vCenter.

password.description: Gets or sets the password to connect with the vCenter.

username.description: Gets or sets username to connect with the vCenter.

controllerKey.description: Gets or sets the controller id.

deviceKey.description: Gets or sets the device key value.

deviceName.description: Gets or sets the device name.

diskMode.description: Gets or sets the disk mode.

diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the disk total size.

diskType.description: Gets or sets the disk backing type.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the virtual disk.

unitNumber.description: Gets or sets the unit number of the disk on the controller.

diskName.description: Gets or sets the name of the virtual disk.

folderPath.description: Gets or sets the folder path of the vm.

instanceUuid.description: Gets or sets the instance uuid of the vm.

ipAddresses.description: Gets or sets the nic ip addresses.

osType.description: Gets or sets the type of the os.

smbiosUuid.description: Gets or sets the SMBIOS UUID of the vm.

folderPath.description: Gets or sets the folder path of the template.

memorySizeMB.description: Gets or sets memory size in MBs for the template.

numCoresPerSocket.description:
Gets or sets the number of cores per socket for the template.
Defaults to 1 if unspecified.

numCPUs.description: Gets or sets the number of vCPUs for the template.

osType.description: Gets or sets the type of the os.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the virtual machine template.

moRefId.description:
Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the virtual machine
template.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this template resides.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the virtual network.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the virtual network.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this template resides.

autoLogon.description: Sets a value indicating whether auto logon is enabled.

domainName.description: Sets domain name that vm should join.

fullName.description: Sets full name of the owner of the vm.

orgName.description: Sets org name to which the owner of the vm belongs.

productId.description: Sets product id of the vm.

timeZone.description: Specifies the time zone of the virtual machine. e.g. "Pacific Standard Time". Time zone name correspond to time zones listed at Microsoft Time Zone name values(https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/windows/embedded/ms912391(v=winembedded.11)).

workGroupName.description: Sets work group name that vm should join.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.
